## matchIsMatchAny variable

Type guard to check if a [Match](./core.match.md) is a [MatchAny](./core.matchany.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
matchIsMatchAny: (match: Match) => match is MatchAny
```
